snippet.title: The Mystery at Greveholm III: The Old Legend (2000)
snippet.description:
Gameplay with commentary. A Swedish point-and-click game influenced by MYST and RIVEN.

Fun game, a few plotholes - they should really have put some more time to think through the very first note of the game - that would have solved most things. Also, lazy to use the same hallway as in the first game.

Correct objects storywise: SPRAK, The Rocket, the security system, batteries

Anachronic objects: the flashlights, the bowling balls, the tennis balls, the pool balls, the bomb?, the lamps in the mine, the flags at treriksröset, the xylophone, the damn "anden i glaset"-game, picture of how the count will look 200 years later, one of the cities that you shoot with cannons at, etc, etc... Too much to handle.
